entities.description: Whether the respondent had any kind of heart condition or heart disease in the past 12 months.
Age at which the respondent was first diagnosed with diabetes or sugar diabetes.
Age at which the respondent was first diagnosed with chronic bronchitis, emphysema, or COPD.
Age at which the respondent was first diagnosed with cirrhosis of the liver.
Age at which the respondent was first diagnosed with hepatitis.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent had any kind of heart condition or heart disease in the past 12 months.
Indicates the age at which the respondent was first diagnosed with diabetes.
Indicates the age at which the respondent was first diagnosed with COPD.
Indicates the age at which the respondent was first diagnosed with cirrhosis of the liver.
Indicates the age at which the respondent was first diagnosed with hepatitis.
